question_text: Each day, Tanjiro during demon slayer training uses 2/9 of a scoop of breathing technique scrolls and 1/9 of a scoop of sword maintenance guides. How many scoops of supplies does Tanjiro use daily?\nWrite your answer as a fraction or as a whole or mixed number.\n_ scoops
solution: Scoops of supplies Tanjiro uses daily = Scoops of breathing technique scrolls used + scoops of sword maintenance guides used. So, find how many scoops of supplies by adding $\frac{2}{9}$ and $\frac{1}{9}$.
When adding fractions with like denominators, simply add the numerators:\n$\frac{2}{9}$+$\frac{1}{9}$ = $\frac{3}{9}$.\nTanjiro uses $\frac{3}{9}$ of a scoop of supplies each day.

question_text: Each day, Joel surviving the apocalypse uses 6/8 of a basket of ammunition clips and 1/8 of a basket of medical supplies. How many baskets of supplies does Joel use daily?\nWrite your answer as a fraction or as a whole or mixed number.\n_ baskets
solution: Baskets of supplies Joel uses daily = Baskets of ammunition clips used + baskets of medical supplies used. So, find how many baskets of supplies by adding $\frac{6}{8}$ and $\frac{1}{8}$.
When adding fractions with like denominators, simply add the numerators:\n$\frac{6}{8}$+$\frac{1}{8}$ = $\frac{7}{8}$.\nJoel uses $\frac{7}{8}$ of a basket of supplies each day.

question_text:
While at the grocery store, Eleven used 5/10 of a package of Eggo waffles as well as 3/10 of a package of regular waffles. How much more Eggo waffles did Eleven use?

Write your answer as a fraction or as a whole or mixed number.


_packages
solution: Find how much more Eggo waffles was used by subtracting $\frac{3}{10}$ from $\frac{5}{10}$.
Subtract the numerators:\n$\frac{5}{10}$–$\frac{3}{10}$ = $\frac{2}{10}$\nEleven used $\frac{2}{10}$ of a package more Eggo waffles.

question_text: Each day, Deku studying at U.A. High uses 5/7 of a crate of hero notebooks and 1/7 of a crate of regular notebooks. How many crates of supplies does Deku use daily?\nWrite your answer as a fraction or as a whole or mixed number.\n_ crates
solution: Crates of supplies Deku uses daily = Crates of hero notebooks used + crates of regular notebooks used. So, find how many crates of supplies by adding $\frac{5}{7}$ and $\frac{1}{7}$.
When adding fractions with like denominators, simply add the numerators:\n$\frac{5}{7}$+$\frac{1}{7}$ = $\frac{6}{7}$.\nDeku uses $\frac{6}{7}$ of a crate of supplies each day.

question_text: Each day, The panda at the wildlife sanctuary uses 3/7 of a crate of bamboo bundles and 2/7 of a crate of leafy greens. How many crates of supplies does The panda use daily?\nWrite your answer as a fraction or as a whole or mixed number.\n_ crates
solution: Crates of supplies The panda uses daily = Crates of bamboo bundles used + crates of leafy greens used. So, find how many crates of supplies by adding $\frac{3}{7}$ and $\frac{2}{7}$.
When adding fractions with like denominators, simply add the numerators:\n$\frac{3}{7}$+$\frac{2}{7}$ = $\frac{5}{7}$.\nThe panda uses $\frac{5}{7}$ of a crate of supplies each day.
